properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 1:56PM CST until January 19 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Mississippi...

Chickasawhay River At Shubuta affecting Clarke County

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Chickasawhay River At Shubuta
* from Saturday morning to Sunday evening.
* At  1:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 28.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 30.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near flood stage
Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 30.0 feet...Minor flooding over the right bank of the
river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours. Rainfall amounts greater than forecast may take the rivers higher.


Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
